title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A fresh and crispy salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Delicious beef tacos with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, tomatoes, and cheese in a crispy shell.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic homemade chocolate chip cookies that are soft, chewy, and absolutely delicious.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Traditional Italian pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil on a thin crust.
